name: Alas, Poor Yorick! Online Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Yorick's pet monkey?
questions.explanation:
Ampersand.

	Ampersand is a male Capuchin monkey, and the only other male besides Yorick to survive the mysterious plague that killed every other male on the planet. Since then, Ampersand has starred on the stage.

questions.text: As the last human male on Earth, Yorick is given his own bodyguard! What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Agent 355.

	The minute the plague hit, Agent 355 removed an ancient relic from the Middle Eastern country of Jordan. She is an orphan, her family having been killed in a traffic accident when she was younger.

questions.text: Doctor Allison Mann is always trying to figure out why Yorick survived the plague. What was Mann's birth name?
questions.explanation:
Ayuko Matsumori.

	Doctor Allison Mann is of Japanese and Chinese heritage, and her birth name was Ayuko Matsumori. She changed her name specifically to annoy her father.

questions.text: Beth Deville is Yorick's girlfriend. Where was she involved in an anthropological study?
questions.explanation:
Australia.

	Yorick proposed to Beth soon after the plague hit, but the two have been seperated for much of the series. Her favorite movie is "Miller's Crossing".

questions.text: On what date did the plague hit?
questions.explanation:
July 17, 2002.

	On Wednesday July 17, 2002, every male animal except for two were killed by a mysterious plague. Within three months, Yorick Brown found himself in Washington, the only human survivor of the incident.

questions.text: Doctor Ciba Weber was on the International Space Station when the plague hit Earth. Strangely, she gives birth to a baby boy. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Vladimir.

	The boy was named Vladimir after his father, another astronaut who died when his team, including Doctor Weber, landed back on Earth.

questions.text: Allison Mann goes to Russia to find the people responsible for the plague.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Mann travels to China to find the people responsible, not Russia. Mann has tried to clone herself, giving birth to the clone at the same instant the plague hit.

questions.text: In the wake of the plague, Margaret Valentine is the new President of the United States. What was her former job?
questions.explanation:
Secretary of Agriculture.

	President Valentine appoints Agent 355 to protect and escort Yorick to Boston, where they would meet up with Doctor Allison Mann. In real life, the first woman to become Secretary of Agriculture was Ann Veneman, who served from January 20, 2001 to January 20, 2005.

questions.text: What is the name of Yorick's daughter with Beth II?
questions.explanation:
Beth.

	Beth II is a former flight attendant who was in the air the moment the plague hit. Taking control of the craft, she landed it safely. She met Yorick in an abandoned church and later gave birth to his daughter, who is referred to as Beth III. (Beth I would be Beth Deville, Yorick's would-be fiancee.)

questions.text: Yorick's mother Jennifer is shot and killed by Alter Tse'elon.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Alter Tse'elon is the chief of the general staff in Israel. "Alter" is not her real first name; her parents refuse to tell her because they had two children die before her. If Alter doesn't know her real name, the angel of death cannot take her life away.
